description.author: Adam Wick <awick@galois.com>
description.synopsis: Implementation of RSA, using the padding schemes of PKCS#1 v2.1.
description.description:
This library implements the RSA encryption and signature
algorithms for arbitrarily-sized ByteStrings. While the
implementations work, they are not necessarily the fastest ones
on the planet. Particularly key generation. The algorithms
included are based of RFC 3447, or the Public-Key Cryptography
Standard for RSA, version 2.1 (a.k.a, PKCS#1 v2.1).

package-flags.name: includemd5
package-flags.description: Include support for using MD5 in the various crypto routines.

package-flags.name: usebinary
package-flags.description: Use the binary package for serializing keys.

package-flags.name: quickcheck1
package-flags.description: Whether this is QuickCheck 1 or not

package-flags.name: oldbase
package-flags.description: Whether or not to use base 3 (default: no)

package-flags.name: hasarbitraryword8
package-flags.description: Whether or not Arbitrary Word8 is defined by QuickCheck
